title: RTX 2080 vs GTX 1080Ti - Were We WRONG?
description: Our RTX 2080 review raised a bunch of questions about performance and how NVIDIA's newest graphics card compared against a custom GTX 1080 Ti.  So, we went and bought an EVGA GTX 1080 Ti and the results were certainly interesting.    RTX 2080 vs GTX 1080 benchmarks!  Buy items in this video from Amazon at the links below:  In-Stock GTX 1080Ti's: Zotac AMP:    Phanteks Digital Starter:   Corsair STRAFE:   Corsair K70M2:    RTX 2080 Ti cards: ASUS Turbo:   ASUS Dual OC:   MSI Duke:   EVGA XC:    RTX 2080 Cards: EVGA XC:   MSI Duke:   ASUS STRIX:   ASUS Dual OC:     Subscribe    Review units provided free of charge by the companies mentioned. This video is sponsored by Phanteks & Corsair. As per HWC guidelines, no review direction was received from manufacturer.   As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.  Gear list (from Amazon)  Panasonic GH5 -  Panasonic GH4 -  Panasonic G7 -  Canon C100 -  Sony RX100m3 -  Sigma 18-35mm F1.8 -  Cinevate DUZI Slider -  AKG C314 -  AKG C 568 B -  Zoom H5 -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  -------------------------------------------------------  #RTX2080 #GTX1080TI #HardwareCanucks
